item.title: Launch: Kallio
item.dc:creator: Brent Lagerman
item.description:
Online shop for a creative kids clothing brand with a sustainable focus.

The post Launch: Kallio appeared first on mimoYmima.
item.content:encoded:
We love the sustainable concept behind Kallio: they take reclaimed men’s shirts and transform them into stylish kids clothing. We just launched their new online shop – visit kallionyc.com

The post Launch: Kallio appeared first on mimoYmima.

item.title: launch: YPI
item.dc:creator: Brent Lagerman
item.description:
A boutique introductions firm that takes a fresh approach to matchmaking.

The post launch: YPI appeared first on mimoYmima.
item.content:encoded:
A boutique introductions firm that takes a fresh approach to matchmaking. Their approach is not based on algorithms – they take the time to actually get to know each client. They’re staffed with people, not robots.

The post launch: YPI appeared first on mimoYmima.

item.title: Beygl
item.dc:creator: Brent Lagerman
item.description:
This new Park Slope eatery has amazing bagels, or as they like to call them, beygls. They are true to the old school methods, creating them in small batches with the best ingredients.

The post Beygl appeared first on mimoYmima.
item.content:encoded:
This new Park Slope eatery has *amazing* bagels, or as they like to spell them: beygls. The funny spelling comes from the word’s yiddish origin. These guys really know and love the process of making these things, so we spent some time illustrating a cool process page that shows how it’s done. We also like how they source wholesome local ingredients from other New York and Brooklyn vendors. You can check out their delicious menu on the website, or if you’re in the Slope stop by and pick up a beygl.

Illustration and Design

* visit the site

The post Beygl appeared first on mimoYmima.

item.title: launch: CoGo Partners
item.dc:creator: Brent Lagerman
item.description:
A boutique executive search firm, CoGo Partners connects exceptional talent with great companies.

The post launch: CoGo Partners appeared first on mimoYmima.
item.content:encoded:
A boutique executive search firm, CoGo Partners connects exceptional talent with great companies. They take the starchy and sterile out of the process with a personal approach. We illustrated their work with both Employers and Candidates with infographics throughout the site

* visit the site

item.title: launch: J. VanSuch Studio
item.dc:creator: Brent Lagerman
item.description:
This Brooklyn-based textile design studio specializes in print and color for womenswear fashion and accessories. Their silk scarfs are more work-of-art than trendy accessory.

The post launch: J. VanSuch Studio appeared first on mimoYmima.
item.content:encoded:
This Brooklyn-based textile design studio specializes in print and color for womenswear fashion and accessories. Their silk scarfs are more work-of-art than trendy-accessory. Their site includes a custom online store, galleries where they can archive their collections, and a blog-style area for their textile and fine art experiments.

visit the site

The post launch: J. VanSuch Studio appeared first on mimoYmima.

item.title: launch: Peace through Mindfulness
item.dc:creator: Brent Lagerman
item.description:
This wise frog has a lot to teach you about mindfulness and meditation.

The post launch: Peace through Mindfulness appeared first on mimoYmima.
item.content:encoded:
We traveled to Australia without leaving Brooklyn! We just launched the site for Oli Doyle, a Mindfulness all-star in Melbourne. His no-nonsense approach to meditation (which, he says right on the homepage, can be boring) inspired us to create a fun character, the meditating frog, featured in different illustrations around the site. The site keeps people posted about upcoming classes, Oli’s new book, blog and other media.

This is the first collaboration with the talented Emily Conley and we’re looking forward to many more projects with her in the future!

The post launch: Peace through Mindfulness appeared first on mimoYmima.

item.title: Ball 4 Hope
item.dc:creator: Brent Lagerman
item.description:
We are proud to launch the site for Ball 4 Hope, a non-profit organization that uses sports to bring smiles and hope to children in poor areas around the world. We created an identity that brings together all of these elements.

The post Ball 4 Hope appeared first on mimoYmima.
item.content:encoded:
We are proud to launch the site for ball4hope, a non-profit organization that uses sports to bring smiles and hope to children in poor areas around the world, the site recommends people areound the globe to always use the best gear when doing exercise like the compression socks men. We created http://www.sportsandsafetysurfaces.co.uk/surface-types/3g/ that brings together all of these elements. Their site keeps people informed about their upcoming fundraising events and mission trips.

The post Ball 4 Hope appeared first on mimoYmima.

item.title: Kris Murphy Photography
item.dc:creator: Brent Lagerman
item.description:
From the beginning we were very excited about designing Kris' website because she started off by telling us how awesome our work is and how she wanted us to come up with original animated art to be the theme for her site.

The post Kris Murphy Photography appeared first on mimoYmima.
item.content:encoded:
From the beginning we were very excited about designing Kris’ website because she started off by telling us how awesome she thought our work was and how she wanted us to come up with original animated art to be the theme for her site!

As inspiration Kris showed us a book by Eric Carle. We made a bunch of paintings and cut out pieces to bring into flash, where animation superhero, Kim Hui, brought them to life.

Original Paintings

Add Magic

The post Kris Murphy Photography appeared first on mimoYmima.
